values.value: The data subject shall have the right to obtain from the controller the erasure of personal data concerning him or her without undue delay and the controller shall have the obligation to erase personal data without undue delay.
GDPR Article 17 - Right to Erasure ('Right to be Forgotten')

1. Implement data deletion request workflow 2. Create Individual object for tracking data subjects 3. Map all personal data fields across objects 4. Document data retention policies 5. Implement cascading deletion logic 6. Maintain deletion audit logs 7. Respond within 30 days of request
